Class ThermodynamicProperties

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.classical.thermodynamics.ThermodynamicProperties
public class ThermodynamicProperties extends Object
Thermodynamic property calculations. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot

  • Constructor Details

    • ThermodynamicProperties

      public ThermodynamicProperties()

  • Method Details

    • gibbsEnergy

      public static double gibbsEnergy(double deltaH, double deltaS, double T)
      Calculates Gibbs free energy change. ΔG = ΔH - T·ΔS
      Parameters:
      deltaH - Enthalpy change (kJ/mol)
      deltaS - Entropy change (J/mol·K)
      T - Temperature (K)
      Returns:
      ΔG in kJ/mol

    • equilibriumConstant

      public static double equilibriumConstant(double deltaG, double T)
      Calculates equilibrium constant from Gibbs energy. K = exp(-ΔG°/(R·T))
      Parameters:
      deltaG - Standard Gibbs energy change (kJ/mol)
      T - Temperature (K)
      Returns:
      Equilibrium constant K

    • gibbsFromK

      public static double gibbsFromK(double K, double T)
      Calculates Gibbs energy from equilibrium constant. ΔG° = -R·T·ln(K)

    • reactionQuotient

      public static double reactionQuotient(double[] productConcentrations, int[] productCoefficients, double[] reactantConcentrations, int[] reactantCoefficients)
      Reaction quotient Q calculation. Q = [products]^ν / [reactants]^ν
      Parameters:
      productConcentrations - Product concentrations
      productCoefficients - Stoichiometric coefficients (positive)
      reactantConcentrations - Reactant concentrations
      reactantCoefficients - Stoichiometric coefficients (positive)
      Returns:
      Reaction quotient Q

    • isSpontaneous

      public static boolean isSpontaneous(double deltaG)
      Determines reaction spontaneity.
      Parameters:
      deltaG - Gibbs energy change
      Returns:
      true if spontaneous (ΔG invalid input: '<' 0)

    • equilibriumTemperature

      public static double equilibriumTemperature(double deltaH, double deltaS)
      Calculates temperature at which ΔG = 0 (equilibrium temperature). T_eq = ΔH / ΔS
      Parameters:
      deltaH - Enthalpy change (kJ/mol)
      deltaS - Entropy change (J/mol·K)
      Returns:
      Equilibrium temperature (K)

    • vantHoff

      public static double vantHoff(double K1, double T1, double T2, double deltaH)
      Van't Hoff equation: temperature dependence of K. ln(K2/K1) = -ΔH°/R * (1/T2 - 1/T1)
      Parameters:
      K1 - Equilibrium constant at T1
      T1 - Temperature 1 (K)
      T2 - Temperature 2 (K)
      deltaH - Standard enthalpy change (kJ/mol)
      Returns:
      K2 at temperature T2

    • heatTransfer

      public static double heatTransfer(double n, double Cp, double deltaT)
      Heat capacity at constant pressure. q = n·Cp·ΔT
      Parameters:
      n - Amount (mol)
      Cp - Molar heat capacity (J/mol·K)
      deltaT - Temperature change (K)
      Returns:
      Heat transferred (J)

    • reactionEnthalpy

      public static double reactionEnthalpy(double[] productFormationEnthalpies, int[] productCoeff, double[] reactantFormationEnthalpies, int[] reactantCoeff)
      Standard enthalpy of reaction from formation enthalpies. ΔH°_rxn = Σ ΔH°_f(products) - Σ ΔH°_f(reactants)
